version_description:
> Stability and performance improvements 
> Bug fixes
> Resume playback of Movie Box and Streaming Recordings
> Parental Pin on device switch-out
> Contextual remote availability 
> Watch the Movies Now Showing trailer channel 
> Watch Movie Box titles 
> Watch Live on selected subscription channels 
> Watch standard definition free to air recordings on your iPhone or iPad*

- New design
- Download to go
- Improved performance
- Bug fixes

-Resolved minor box connectivity issues
-Fixed box connection retry button
-EPG search results now returns user to selected title
-Bug fixes

Improvements
- Updated login and connectivity to the Fetch TV box.

Bug fixes
- Fixed digital rights management errors associated with playback offline.
- Removes duplicated download tiles.
- Fixed offline bookmarks.
- Fixed Playback errors.
- More stable setting of series tags.
- 150 other minor bug fixes.

Improvements
- Updated login and connectivity to the Fetch TV box.

Bug fixes
- Fixed digital rights management errors associated with playback offline.
- Removes duplicated download tiles.
- Fixed offline bookmarks.
- Fixed Playback errors.
- More stable setting of series tags.
- Fixed offline playback crash.
- 150 other minor bug fixes.

Thanks to everyone who gave us feedback on the last app update - we heard you! In this release we have addressed some of the issues, and we're still working on some others for future releases. So here's what's changed in this one:

TV Guide:
- We've brought back the Grid EPG which you can find under TV Guide on the home menu. This makes it easier to browse all channels and then select to Watch Live, or set Recordings and Series Tags.
- Everything you could do from the Control menu in the previous app version, you can now do from the TV Guide. The Remote Control is activated directly from the top left of the TV Guide, and the Channel Changer is accessed by swiping left on the remote.
- We've added a play symbol in the logo box for channels you are subscribed to, making it easier to see what you can watch live on the app. At this stage you still need to add new pack subscriptions via your box.
- We've also added large images that display when you select a show from the TV Guide, helping make it easier to recognise and select shows.

TV Menu:
- In the TV section we've increased visibility of the channels you already have access to in your pack subscriptions, helping you to decide what to watch live right now. You can still access the paid TV Store content from here, it's just moved further down.
- You can now also watch catch-up episodes from a selection of the channels included in your subscription packs. We've not yet been able to provide access to recordings, but the addition of catch-up does give you more on demand TV options.

Other changes:
- We've updated our logo.
- Tweaks to further improve speed, performance and stability.
- The usual general bug fixes.
